analysis.description: ERC223Token.isContract (/unique_chucks/45/0x5fc8cc015187aec8b8883136c03ec8ea4975fa8d.sol#193-199) is declared view but contains assembly code

	-transfer (/unique_chucks/45/0x5fc8cc015187aec8b8883136c03ec8ea4975fa8d.sol#82-87)

empty in ERC223Token.transfer (/unique_chucks/45/0x5fc8cc015187aec8b8883136c03ec8ea4975fa8d.sol#86-87) is a local variable never initialiazed
